name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ "main", "master" ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ "main", "master" ]

jobs:
  build-test:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          distribution: 'temurin'
          java-version: '17'
          cache: 'maven'

      - name: Build & Test
        run: mvn -B clean test
